sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPINA cervina, the ſame as the rhamnus catharticus. See Rhamnus.
Spina Ventosa, in ſurgery, that ſpecies of corruption of the bones which takes its rise in the internal parts, and by degrees enlarges the bone, and raiſes it into a tumor. See Surgery.
